name: Civil Rights Defenders
goal:
Civil Rights Defenders defends people’s civil and political rights in pursuit of our vision. We partner with and support human rights defenders who work in some of the world’s most repressive regions.

Through advocacy, litigation, and public campaigns, we advance people’s rights globally. We also act as Sweden’s local civil rights watchdog group.
interests: Culture, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum
euInitiatives: The organisation follows the foreign policy of the EU in its target countries, which span across the whole world. We follow the activities of the European Parliament, EEAS and European Commission, as well as discussions and decisions of the Council of the EU.
